definition: inaccessible and sparsely populated, a device that can be used to control a machine or apparatus from a distance
details:
adjective
- inaccessible and sparsely populated
= synonyms: outback
- located far away spatially
= synonyms: distant
- separate or apart in time
= synonyms: distant, removed
- far apart in relevance or relationship or kinship
= synonyms: distant
- very unlikely

noun
